t: Re: Favorite Products No Longer Carried? - Beauty Insider Community
s: March 7, 2022 - They no longer carry some of my staples: Origins tinted sunscreen and Philosophy Purity face cleanser. The products are available elsewhere, but it makes me wonder if Sephora is in trouble and not getting popular products.  · Would love some insight here. I'm worried! ... I’m feel you - devastated when I went to search my favorite brand Omorovicza & saw only one product listed & about 50% off too...
